DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial identify much protein require breakfast promote positive whole body protein balance follow 9h period .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Optimal Amount Proteins Breakfast Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study first establish role eat protein breakfast whole body protein balance healthy child .
DOC.criteria: Aged 712 year age Healthy recreationally physically active ( obtain 3 day average moderate/vigorous physical activity least 30 min/day ) Body mass ≥10th percentile 7 year old ≤85th percentile 12 year old . Values base upon 2000 CDC Growth Charts United States Having obtain his/her inform assent Having obtain his/her consent parent legal guardian Being able communicate local language Have habitual daily protein consumption 1.6 g/kg 2.4 g/kg/bw Selfreport regular medication impact metabolism , corticoid , hormone ( e.g thyroid , adrenal ) treatment , medication diabetes hypercholesterolemia hypertriglyceridemia Selfreported history metabolic , hepatic renal disease Selfreported allergy milk protein ( e.g. , whey casein ) intolerance food ingredient use study product meal Within 1.5 year estimate age peak height velocity ( PHV ) Special diet weight loss program ( e.g Atkins diet ) Consuming breakfast contain 21g protein day 3d screening period Subject expect comply study procedure , include unwillingness consume study product meal Currently participate participate another nutritionalclinical trial last 2 month prior begin study
